name: 128 people
description: The first digital animattion in Flash I managed to show in a exhibiton as an installation in a long corridor in 2003. 128 people rattle their limbs waiting to perform one of 50 available moves and flashing red-green-blue tones. Then they fall out of the screen and finally two figures might dance suddenly exactly the same dance. CR521 â€“ https://hansup.be/2003_128-people_animation_hans-verhaegen.html
